desc: You have tattoos on your body corresponding to the ancient Thassilonian school of necromancy. You can cast chill touch as an innate arcane spell at will.
access: Varisian ethnicity or New Thassilon nationality
shortdesc: You have tattoos on your body corresponding to one of the ancient Thassilonian schools of magic.

name: Arcane Tattoos: Transmutation
desc: You have tattoos on your body corresponding to the ancient Thassilonian school of transmutation. You can cast sigil as an innate arcane spell at will.
access: Varisian ethnicity or New Thassilon nationality
shortdesc: You have tattoos on your body corresponding to one of the ancient Thassilonian schools of magic.

name: Cooperative Nature
desc: The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus on checks to Aid.
hint: You gain a +4 circumstance bonus on checks to Aid.
shortdesc: The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness.

name: Courteous Comeback
desc: You grew up in the proud Padishah Empire, where even insults have a certain poetic wit.
shortdesc: You grew up in the proud Padishah Empire, where even insults have a certain poetic wit.

name: Devil's Advocate
desc: You know more about the habits of devils than is entirely safe. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks against devils and saving throws against their abilities. In addition, whenever you meet a devil in a social situation, you can immediately attempt a Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on that creature rather than needing to converse for 1 minute. You take a -5 penalty to the check. If you fail, you can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.
specialdesc: If you have the Glad-Hand skill feat, you don't take the penalty to your immediate Diplomacy check if the target is a devil.
hint: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks against devils and saving throws against their abilities. In addition, whenever you meet a devil in a social situation, you can immediately attempt a Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on that creature rather than needing to converse for 1 minute. You take a -5 penalty to the check. If you have the Glad-Hand skill feat, you don't take the penalty to your immediate Diplomacy check if the target is a devil. If you fail, you can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.
shortdesc: You know more about the habits of devils than is entirely safe.

name: Dragon Spit
desc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. Choose one of the following cantrips: acid splash, electric arc, produce flame, or ray of frost. You can cast this spell as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
shortdesc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage.

name: Dragon Spit: Acid Splash
desc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. You can cast acid splash as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
hint: When you cast acid splash as an innate spell gained through the Dragon Spit feat, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
shortdesc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage.

name: Dragon Spit: Electric Arc
desc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. You can cast electric arc as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
hint: When you cast electric arc as an innate spell gained through the Dragon Spit feat, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
shortdesc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage.

desc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. You can cast produce flame as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
hint: When you cast produce flame as an innate spell gained through the Dragon Spit feat, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
shortdesc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage.

name: Dragon Spit: Ray of Frost
desc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. You can cast ray of frost as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
hint: When you cast ray of frost as an innate spell gained through the Dragon Spit feat, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
shortdesc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true - you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage.

gainSpellChoice.source: Feat: Dragon Spit: Ray of Frost

name: General Training
desc: Your adaptability manifests in your mastery of a range of useful abilities. You gain a 1st-level general feat. You must meet the feat's prerequisites, but if you select this feat during character creation, you can select the feat later in the process in order to determine which prerequisites you meet.
specialdesc: You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different feat each time.
shortdesc: Your adaptability manifests in your mastery of a range of useful abilities.

name: Gloomseer
shortdesc: Gloom holds few terrors for you, and the pall of darkness over Nidal has made you comfortable in dim light.

name: Haughty Obstinacy
shortdesc: Your powerful ego makes it harder for others to order you around.

name: Keep Up Appearances
shortdesc: Taldan pride means you never show weakness.

name: Know Oneself
shortdesc: You center yourself and call to mind the Vudrani monastic ideals of mindfulness and self-knowledge.

name: Natural Ambition
desc: You were raised to be ambitious and always reach for the stars, leading you to progress quickly in your chosen field. You gain a 1st-level class feat for your class. You must meet the prerequisites, but you can select the feat later in the character creation process in order to determine which prerequisites you meet.
shortdesc: You were raised to be ambitious and always reach for the stars, leading you to progress quickly in your chosen field.

name: Natural Skill
shortdesc: Your ingenuity allows you to learn a wide variety of skills.

name: Quah Bond
shortdesc: You grew up among the Shoanti tribes, with the spirits watching over you, and they offer you guidance.

name: Saoc Astrology
shortdesc: The ancient Saoc Brethren were the masters of astrology, and while your knowledge may be but a pale shadow of their wisdom, it still comes in handy.

name: Tupilaq Carver
shortdesc: You know the truth behind old stories that tell of sending a fetish of bone and sinew to seek vengeance.
specialreqdesc: You have a spellcasting class feature with the divine or primal tradition

name: Unconventional Weaponry
shortdesc: You've familiarized yourself with a particular weapon, potentially from another ancestry or culture.

name: Viking Shieldbearer
shortdesc: You trained with shields and weapons as soon as you were old enough to hold them, eager to win honor and glory for yourself.

name: Witch Warden
shortdesc: You and your family have fought long and hard against witches, particularly the winter witches of Irrisen, and you've learned to be wary of their curses and the otherworldly powers their patrons grant.

name: Adaptive Adept
shortdesc: You've continued adapting your magic to blend your class's tradition with your adapted tradition.

name: Clever Improviser
desc: You've learned how to handle situations when you're out of your depth. You gain the Untrained Improvisation general feat. In addition, you can attempt skill actions that normally require you to be trained, even if you are untrained.
hint: You can attempt skill actions that normally require you to be trained, even if you are untrained.
shortdesc: You've learned how to handle situations when you're out of your depth.

name: Darkseer
shortdesc: Zon-Kuthon smiles upon you—even if you curse his name—granting you pitch-black eyes that allow you to see in shadows and darkness.

name: Ornate Tattoo
shortdesc: You expand your tattoos to encompass greater magic.

name: Wavetouched Paragon
shortdesc: You have been blessed by the sea, granting you the ability to swim like a fish.

name: Cooperative Soul
shortdesc: You have developed a soul-deep bond with your comrades and maintain an even greater degree of cooperation with them.

name: Dragon Prince
shortdesc: The blood of the Dragon Kings runs strong in your veins.

name: Heir of the Saoc
shortdesc: In the past, you would have been a proud initiate of the Saoc Brethren.

name: Incredible Improvisation
shortdesc: A stroke of brilliance gives you a major advantage with a skill despite your inexperience.

name: Multitalented
shortdesc: You've learned to split your focus between multiple classes with ease.

name: Shory Aeromancer
shortdesc: Your ancestors hailed from the flying cities of the Shory, and a few simple tricks have come down through the ages to you.

name: Virtue-Forged Tattoos
shortdesc: Your tattoos are a work of eldritch genius, a masterpiece of art, magic, and skin.

name: Irriseni Ice-Witch
shortdesc: You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself.

name: Shadow Pact
shortdesc: Thousands of years ago, your ancestors made a pact with Zon-Kuthon.

name: Shory Aerialist
shortdesc: Unique in Golarion's history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air.
specialreqdesc: Garundi, Mauxi, or Tian-Yae ethnicity; Shory Aeromancer or ability to cast fly

name: Unconventional Expertise
shortdesc: You've continued to advance your powers using your unconventional weapon.
specialreqdesc: trained in the weapon you chose for Unconventional Weaponry

name: Ancestral Longevity
desc: You have accumulated a vast array of lived knowledge over the years. During your daily preparations, you can reflect upon your life experiences to gain the trained proficiency rank in one skill of your choice. This proficiency lasts until you prepare again. Since this proficiency is temporary, you can't use it as a prerequisite for a skill increase or a permanent character option like a feat.
shortdesc: You have accumulated a vast array of lived knowledge over the years.

name: Elemental Wrath
desc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings. When you gain this feat, select acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You can call to the land to cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate primal spell at will, except the spell has only verbal components and deals the type of damage you chose instead of acid damage; the spell gains the trait appropriate to its damage instead of the acid trait. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
shortdesc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings.

name: Elemental Wrath: Acid
desc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings. You can call to the land to cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate primal spell at will, except the spell has only verbal components. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
hint: When you cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate spell gained through the Elemental Wrath feat, it has only verbal components.
shortdesc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings.

name: Elemental Wrath: Cold
desc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings. You can call to the land to cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate primal spell at will, except the spell has only verbal components and deals cold damage instead of acid damage; the spell gains the cold trait appropriate to its damage instead of the acid trait. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
hint: When you cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate spell gained through the Elemental Wrath feat, it has only verbal components and deals cold damage instead of acid damage. It gains the cold trait instead of the acid trait.
shortdesc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings.

name: Elemental Wrath: Electricity
desc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings. You can call to the land to cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate primal spell at will, except the spell has only verbal components and deals electricity damage instead of acid damage; the spell gains the electricity trait appropriate to its damage instead of the acid trait. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
hint: When you cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate spell gained through the Elemental Wrath feat, it has only verbal components and deals electricity damage instead of acid damage. It gains the cold trait instead of the electricity trait.
shortdesc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings.

name: Elemental Wrath: Fire
desc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings. You can call to the land to cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate primal spell at will, except the spell has only verbal components and deals fire damage instead of acid damage; the spell gains the fire trait appropriate to its damage instead of the acid trait. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
hint: When you cast the acid splash cantrip as an innate spell gained through the Elemental Wrath feat, it has only verbal components and deals fire damage instead of acid damage. It gains the fire trait instead of the acid trait.
shortdesc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings.

name: Elven Lore
shortdesc: You've studied in traditional elven arts, learning about arcane magic and the world around you.

name: Elven Verve
shortdesc: While all elves are immune to the paralyzing touch of ghouls, you can shake off flesh-numbing magic of all kinds.

name: Elven Weapon Familiarity
shortdesc: You favor bows and other elegant weapons.

name: Forlorn
shortdesc: Watching your friends age and die fills you with moroseness that protects you against harmful emotions.

name: Nimble Elf
desc: Your muscles are tightly honed. Your Speed increases by 5 feet.
shortdesc: Your muscles are tightly honed.

name: Otherworldly Magic
shortdesc: Your elven magic manifests as a simple arcane spell, even if you aren't formally trained in magic.

name: Share Thoughts
shortdesc: You have an uncanny knack of communicating with other elves without speaking, though this habit that is often uncomfortable to observers.

name: Unwavering Mien
shortdesc: Your mystic control and meditations allow you to resist external influences upon your consciousness.

name: Wildborn Magic
shortdesc: You have learned to access the old magic of wild places.

name: Woodcraft
shortdesc: You have a innate familiarity with forested areas.

name: Ageless Patience
shortdesc: You work at a pace born from longevity that enhances your thoroughness.

name: Defiance Unto Death
shortdesc: You loathe the alghollthus and their mind magic, and you've been trained to be willing to die rather than give into mental manipulation.

name: Elven Instincts
shortdesc: Your senses let you react rapidly.

name: Elven Weapon Elegance
shortdesc: You are attuned to the weapons of your elven ancestors and are particularly deadly when using them.

name: Forest Stealth
shortdesc: You are skilled at quickly hiding behind bits of underbrush or foliage.

name: Wildborn Adept
shortdesc: The whispers of the jungle grant you more diverse access to simple primal magic.

name: Brightness Seeker
shortdesc: Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes studying your surroundings in search of omens related to a particular course of action to cast augury as an innate divine spell.

name: Elf Step
shortdesc: You move in a graceful dance, and even your steps are broad.

name: Expert Longevity
shortdesc: You've continued to refine the knowledge and skills you've gained through your life.

name: Sense Thoughts
shortdesc: You have an even stranger knack for knowing what other people are thinking.

name: Elven Weapon Expertise
shortdesc: Your elven affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with elven weapons.

name: Universal Longevity
shortdesc: You've perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you've learned over your long life.

name: Wandering Heart
shortdesc: While all elves adapt to their environments over time, you have traveled so widely and become attuned to so many environs that your body now changes more rapidly than other elves.
specialreqdesc: arctic elf, cavern elf, desert elf, woodland elf, or any other elf heritage based on adapting to an environment

name: Lizardfolk Lore
shortdesc: You listened carefully to the tales passed down among your community.

name: Marsh Runner
shortdesc: You are adept at moving through marshy terrain.

name: Parthenogenic Hatchling
desc: You were hatched from an unfertilized egg during hard times for your people, and you are a biological copy of your mother. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against diseases. Each of your successful saving throws against a disease reduces its stage by 2, or by 1 for a virulent disease. Each critical success against an ongoing disease reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 for a virulent disease. You take damage only every 2 hours from thirst and every 2 days from starvation, rather than every hour and every day.
hint: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against diseases. Each of your successful saving throws against a disease reduces its stage by 2, or by 1 for a virulent disease. Each critical success against an ongoing disease reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 for a virulent disease. You take damage only every 2 hours from thirst and every 2 days from starvation, rather than every hour and every day.
shortdesc: You were hatched from an unfertilized egg during hard times for your people, and you are a biological copy of your mother.

name: Razor Claws
shortdesc: Your have honed your claws to be deadly.

name: Reptile Speaker
shortdesc: You hear the sounds of reptiles as language.

name: Sharp Fangs
shortdesc: Your teeth are formidable weapons.

name: Tail Whip
shortdesc: By birth or through training, your tail is strong enough to make for a powerful melee weapon.

name: Envenom Fangs
shortdesc: You envenom your fangs.

name: Gecko's Grip
desc: You stick to walls with a preternatural grip. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.
shortdesc: You stick to walls with a preternatural grip.

name: Iruxi Unarmed Cunning
shortdesc: You make the most of your iruxi unarmed attacks.

name: Shed Tail
shortdesc: You can shed your tail to escape.

name: Swift Swimmer
shortdesc: You swim faster than most iruxi.

name: Terrain Advantage
shortdesc: You can take advantage of the terrain to bypass foes' defenses.

name: Iruxi Unarmed Expertise
shortdesc: Your unarmed attacks blend tradition and training.

name: Elf Atavism
desc: Your elven blood runs particularly strong, granting you features far more elven than those of a typical half-elf. You may also have been raised among elves, steeped in your elven ancestors' heritage. You gain the benefits of the elf heritage of your elven parent or ancestors. You typically can't select a heritage that depends on or improves an elven feature you don't have. For example, you couldn't gain the cavern elf's darkvision ability if you didn't have low-light vision. In these cases, at the GM's discretion, you might gain a different benefit.
specialdesc: You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.
shortdesc: Your elven blood runs particularly strong, granting you features far more elven than those of a typical half-elf.

name: Round Ears
shortdesc: Your elven lineage is subtle enough that you look barely different from other humans, and you've learned to use that to your advantage.

name: Sociable
shortdesc: You're extremely extroverted, and you often spend your time carousing or otherwise socializing.

name: Inspire Imitation
shortdesc: Your own actions inspire your allies to great achievements.

name: Supernatural Charm
shortdesc: The elven magic in your blood manifests as a force you can use to become more appealing or alluring.

name: Monstrous Peacemaker
shortdesc: Your dual human and orc nature has given you a unique perspective.

name: Orc Ferocity
desc: Fierceness in battle runs through your blood, and you refuse to fall from your injuries.
shortdesc: Fierceness in battle runs through your blood, and you refuse to fall from your injuries.

name: Orc Sight
shortdesc: Your orc blood is strong enough to grant you the keen vision of your orc forebears.

name: Orc Superstition
shortdesc: You defend yourself against magic by relying on techniques derived from orc cultural superstitions.

name: Orc Weapon Familiarity
shortdesc: In combat, you favor the brutal weapons that are traditional for your orc ancestors.

name: Overlooked Mastermind
shortdesc: Many consider half-orcs little more than dumb brutes.

name: Orc Weapon Carnage
shortdesc: You are brutally efficient with the weapons of your orc ancestors.

name: Victorious Vigor
shortdesc: Your victories in battle fill you with pride and imbue you with the energy to fight a bit longer despite your wounds.

name: Pervasive Superstition
shortdesc: You steep yourself in superstition and practice ancient orc mental exercises for shrugging off the effects of magic.

name: Incredible Ferocity
shortdesc: Given time to collect yourself after a near-death scrape, you can rebuild your ferocity and withstand additional finishing blows.

name: Orc Weapon Expertise
shortdesc: Your orc affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with orc weapons.

name: Mountain's Stoutness
desc:
Your hardiness lets you withstand more punishment than most before going down. Increase your maximum Hit Points by your level. When you have the dying condition, the DC of your recovery checks is equal to 9 + your dying value (instead of 10 + your dying value).

If you also have the Toughness feat, the Hit Points gained from it and this feat are cumulative, and the DC of your recovery checks is equal to 6 + your dying value.
hint: When you have the dying condition, the DC of your recovery checks is equal to 9 + your dying value (instead of 10 + your dying value). If you have the Toughness feat, the DC of your recovery checks is equal to 6 + your dying value.
shortdesc: Your hardiness lets you withstand more punishment than most before going down.

name: Badlands Orc
desc: You come from sun-scorched badlands, where long legs and an ability to withstand the elements helped you thrive. You treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less extreme (incredible heat becomes extreme, extreme heat becomes severe, and so on).
hint: You treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less extreme (incredible heat becomes extreme, extreme heat becomes severe, and so on).
shortdesc: You come from sun-scorched badlands, where long legs and an ability to withstand the elements helped you thrive.

name: Badlands Orc Hustle
desc: You come from sun-scorched badlands, where long legs and an ability to withstand the elements helped you thrive. You can Hustle twice as long while exploring before you have to stop.
hint: You can Hustle twice as long while exploring before you have to stop.
shortdesc: You come from sun-scorched badlands, where long legs and an ability to withstand the elements helped you thrive.

name: Raging Intimidation
desc: Your fury fills your foes with fear. While you are raging, your Demoralize and Scare to Death actions (from the Intimidation skill and an Intimidation skill feat, respectively) gain the rage trait, allowing you to use them while raging. As soon as you meet the prerequisites for the skill feats Intimidating Glare and Scare to Death, you gain these feats.
hint: While you are raging, your Demoralize and Scare to Death actions (from the Intimidation skill and an Intimidation skill feat, respectively) gain the rage trait, allowing you to use them while raging.
shortdesc: Your fury fills your foes with fear.
